result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case Called: 10:34 am
Clerk:  Kim H.  
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo for ADA Natalie Zibolski; Deft appears in person/in custody and with Atty Thomas Roley
Atty Roley waives preliminary examination  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea:  Not guilty
Dates set: CC on 5/25/22 at 8:05 am
C: Br. 4
Adj: 10:37 am
Preliminary Hearing on May 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

No contact with victim(s): H.J.K.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Amy. 
Case called:  2:02 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence.   Defendant appears in custody by video from MCJ with Atty Adam Fontana. 

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.

- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
